entity.description: US House of Representatives Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (CA-12)

text: @SpeakerPelosi @US_FDA I have had numerous flu vaccines and a few pneumonia vaccines. I had no problems with the vaccines. I have not have the flu or pneumonia. The vaccines do help and I am willing to have the coronavirus vaccine when available. I advice everyone to have the coronavirus vaccine.
